description: We wore our red, gold & white to cheer on the San Francisco 49ers in the Super Bowl last weekend. Congrats to the Kansas City Chiefs on their victory!

Last month we had to say goodbye to Hug Pug Rio Bravo. He was loving, fun, smart, and brought joy to all of his Justia peeps. With his tender and compassionate soul, he also served as a therapy dog visiting nursing homes. We are lucky to have had him in our lives and will miss him so much.
